topic.title: We need tags
topic.body: Should be able to tag threads, so that you can filter by subject. Right now it's a mess.

1526458774_1KmaTupsDcCfvhdoaacEsEZRGsotw.body: That would probably be worth a lot of money.

1854_1PFWGebEqZssXXnM9u2gk7yJpXUoMPQG8D.body:
Start with improving ZeroTalk:

Tags. Organize posts, like how subreddits do (but you'd be able to use multiple tags on one post). Eg I could write in a separate field or in the post body: #zeronet #suggestion #zerotalk - then someone can "subscribe" to "#zeronet #suggestion" and see that post.

Option to list posts oldest first.

Image attachments.

Maybe threaded comments, Reddit style.

1526523255_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: You just need to build up speed for 12 hours.
